Message:
“Queen Amleth,
why are your arms
thrown around that tree?”

“...!! N-No.
There is nothing
to worry about.
Nothing at all...”

What I said was only
necessary to close
the curtains on the stage—
not my true feelings
in any way...

Before I knew it,
the fog had vanished.
The real Ophelia,
who had finally joined me,
was looking at me with
a curious look on her face.

It appears that Nina was
also safe and sound.

Indeed, that fog must show
illusions that reflect
one’s own desires.

That is why I found
myself telling Ophelia...

“...There are more
mysterious things
in heaven and earth than
you can ever imagine.”

“Nothing.
More importantly,
since we do not have
many a chance like this,
shall we go for a swim?”

Humans are frail.
We shape fantastical nightmares
in a future of airy nothing.

But with you here with me,
I will not lose my way.

Thus, please be by my side
forevermore, Ophelia.
